isis.stitle: TSI 03-12-02 - New Engine Wiring Harness With Improved EMI Protection

subjectgroup.subject: New Engine Wiring Harness With Improved EMI Protection

geninfo.para: This new wiring harness, part number 1807453C94, is equipped with aluminum shielding through the wiring harness and on the Camshaft Position (CMP) sensor wires which will eliminate the EMI (Electromagnetic Interference) to 2-way radio transmission. The aluminum shielding will also protect from possible outside interference with the CMP sensor signal.
The old wiring harness did not have aluminum shielding through the wiring harness.

The new shielded wiring harness is applicable to T 444E engines, serial number 661894 and above. The estimated availability of the new wiring harness (part number 1807453C94) is sometime early April 2003 for service and implementation on new production engine builds.
